text: Louis Skidmore (April 8, 1897 â€“ September 27, 1962) was an American architect. He was born in Lawrenceburg, Indiana. He was the co-founder of the architecture firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill and recipient of the AIA Gold Medal. Skidmore died on September 27, 1962 in Winter Haven, Florida, aged 65. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1962 deaths Category:American architects Category:Businesspeople from Indiana
title: Louis Skidmore
